triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: cvc5 is an SMT solver that addresses the core task of determining satisfiability of mathematical formulas modulo theories.

triples.name: Cooperating Validity Checker
triples.relevance: cvc5 builds directly on CVC4 from the Cooperating Validity Checker family of SMT solvers.

triples.name: Z3 Theorem Prover
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates cvc5's performance against Z3, a competing SMT solver developed by Microsoft.
